author: smuzaffar
body: -Ofast flag with clang on slc6 failed to compile due to missing `__[exp|log|pow]_finite` symbols (  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/24935 ) . This PR now make use of new tool ofast-flag which for added `--no-builtin` flag for  llvm/slc6  ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/blob/IB/CMSSW_10_4_X/gcc700/gcc-toolfile.spec#L132 ).
title: use ofast-flag tool instead of directly CXXFLAGS=-Ofast
